results.name: Number of partitions of n into distinct parts, where the difference between the number of odd parts and the number of even parts is 6.
comment: With offset 42 number of partitions of n into distinct parts, where the difference between the number of odd parts and the number of even parts is -6.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 36..1000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t) option remember; `if`(n>i*(i+1)/2 or
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 02 2014
